meanings.definition: A child in the earliest period of life
meanings.sent1: New parents often seek advice on how to care for their infants.
meanings.sent2: The hospital has a special unit for newborn infants.
meanings.sent3: The infants in the nursery were all peacefully sleeping.
meanings.sent4: The innocence of infants is like a blank canvas waiting to be painted.
meanings.sent5: The giggles and coos of infants fill the room with joy.

meanings.definition: A person who is not of full age
meanings.sent1: Teenagers are considered infants in the eyes of the law until they turn 18.
meanings.sent2: The school provided support for the infants transitioning into adulthood.
meanings.sent3: The group of young friends jokingly referred to themselves as infants of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, newcomers are often seen as infants in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The novel explores the challenges faced by infants navigating the complexities of growing up.
